dcterms:creator: A. Dosovitskiy
G. Ros
F. Codevilla
A. Lopez
V. Koltun
dcterms:description: A synthetic dataset for short-term trajectory prediction tasks using the CARLA simulator, incorporating complex scenarios such as pedestrians crossing the road and vehicles overtaking, consisting of 6000 perspective view images with corresponding IMU and odometry information for each frame.
dcterms:title: CARLA Synthetic Dataset

dcterms:description: A dataset consisting of 1000 perspective view images created to simulate basic driving scenarios with ego vehicles and pedestrians.
dcterms:title: Level 1 Dataset

dcterms:description: A more complex dataset consisting of 5000 images designed to simulate intricate driving scenarios with a higher number of vehicles and pedestrians.
dcterms:title: Level 2 Dataset
